content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)
Consists of lab and nearby chests for storing science packs

### Electricity distribution at position(x=4.5, y=5.5)
Consists of small electric poles at positions (x=4.5,y=5.5), (x=8.5,y=9.5), (x=2.5,y=2.5), (x=2.5,y=1.5)

### Water distribution at position(x=-8.5, y=22.5)
Consists of pipes at positions (x=-8.5,y=22.5), (x=-8.5,y=23.5), (x=-9.5,y=23.5), (x=-6.5,y=22.5), (x=-7.5,y=22.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner mining drills
- Ensure that the burner mining drill has sufficient fuel before attempting to mine resources
- Make sure to place the burner mining drill at a valid position where resources can be mined

### Errors when using furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace has sufficient fuel and ingredients before attempting to smelt resources
- Make sure to place the furnace at a valid position where resources can be smelted

### Errors when using steam engines
- Ensure that the steam engine has a valid input liquid and fluid connections before attempting to generate electricity
- Make sure to place the steam engine at a valid position where electricity can be generated

### Errors when using boilers
- Ensure that the boiler has sufficient fuel before attempting to generate steam
- Make sure to place the boiler at a valid position where steam can be generated

### Errors when using offshore pumps
- Ensure that the offshore pump has a valid connection to a fluid system before attempting to pump fluids
- Make sure to place the offshore pump at a valid position where fluids can be pumped

### Errors when managing inventory
- Ensure that the agent has sufficient resources in its inventory before attempting to craft or use items
- Make sure to manage the inventory efficiently to avoid running out of resources
